com.scvngr.levelup.core.net

Class LevelUpV13RequestWithCurrentUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.AbstractRequest
      • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.BufferedRequest
        • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.LevelUpV13Request
          • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.LevelUpV13RequestWithCurrentUser
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public final class LevelUpV13RequestWithCurrentUser
extends LevelUpV13Request
    Subclass of LevelUpV13Request which will format the url string to include the id of the currently logged in user. Will also always append the access token if it's available.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.AbstractRequest

        endpoint - the endpoint to hit. Must include the proper %d format string for formatting the user id in.

        postParams - the post parameters.
